name: fittrackee
description: FitTrackee is an open-source sports tracker with a privacy-first approach. It supports GPX files, map views, stats, and calorie tracking for running, cycling, and hiking. Everything runs locally on your own server.
features: Sports Tracking: Privacy-first activity tracker, GPX file support, Map views and stats. Self-hosted fitness monitoring.
Activity Types: Running, cycling, hiking support. Multi-sport tracking.
Calorie Tracking: Monitor energy expenditure. Health insights.
Local Storage: Everything runs on your server. Complete privacy.
Map Integration: Visualize routes. Geographic tracking.
Statistics: Distance, pace, elevation. Detailed metrics.
Workout History: Review past activities. Progress tracking.
Weather Data: Track conditions during workouts. Environmental context.
Export: Download GPX files. Data portability.
